item.title: By: Jim
item.dc:creator: Jim
item.description: <p>I know it's nothing to do with the above but I can't find the xmas website and the address Judith gave me is wrong! have a good time. Jim</p>
item.content:encoded: I know it’s nothing to do with the above but I can’t find the xmas website and the address Judith gave me is wrong! have a good time. Jim

item.title: By: Fi

item.description: <p>Have also decided I need to read lord of the rings. At least have read three of the four others on the top five list!</p>
item.content:encoded: Have also decided I need to read lord of the rings. At least have read three of the four others on the top five list!

item.title: By: Ben Poole
item.dc:creator: Ben Poole
item.description: <p>Enjoy! Haven't done War & Peace yet, but received LOTR some 20 years ago... finally read it in 2001. It's very good <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif"</a> /></p>
item.content:encoded: Enjoy! Haven’t done War & Peace yet, but received LOTR some 20 years ago… finally read it in 2001. It’s very good http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif“ />
